_comment: DEPLOYMENT INSTRUCTIONS: 1) Deploy code.js to Google Apps Script as backend API, 2) Deploy this dashboard to GitHub Pages/Netlify, 3) Update the 'inventory' URL below with your Google Apps Script deployment URL

app.name: Deep Roots Operations Dashboard
app.description: Unified dashboard for all Deep Roots Landscape operational tools

inventory._comment: REQUIRED: This is your primary backend. Deploy code.js to Google Apps Script and paste the Web App URL here. All API calls route through this endpoint.
inventory.name: Clippings - Inventory Management
inventory.description: Search inventory, manage stock, track equipment

grading._comment: Repair vs Replace Decision Tool - Google Apps Script Web App. IMPORTANT: Ensure deployment is set to 'Who has access: Anyone' for this to work.
grading.name: Repair vs Replace
grading.description: Plant quality assessment and repair/replace decisions

scheduler._comment: Daily Scheduler - Deployed via GitHub Pages
scheduler.name: Daily Scheduler

tools._comment: Hand Tool Tracker - Deployed via GitHub Pages
tools.name: Tool Rental Checkout
tools.description: Hand tool rental and checkout system

ai.fallbackMessage: I can help you with inventory, grading decisions, scheduling, or tool rentals. What would you like to do?
ai.routingPrompt: Analyze this query and determine which tool would be most helpful: inventory management, plant grading, scheduling, or tool checkout. Return only: 'inventory', 'grading', 'scheduler', 'tools', or 'general'.

deployment._comment: Deployment strategy: Backend (code.js) goes to Google Apps Script. Frontend (this dashboard) goes to GitHub Pages or Netlify.

backend.instructions: Deploy code.js to Google Apps Script as a Web App, then update services.inventory.url with the deployment URL

frontend.instructions: Deploy these files to static hosting. Update config.json with backend URL before deployment.
